COUNTRY GUNMAN

You keep your weapon holstered until the last second. You prefer to stare down opponents than use your firearm. However, when drawn, you make it quick and final—single shots, single kills.

SYNERGY

This archetype works best with the face, grounder, gunslinger, and marshal classes.

PROFICIENCIES

You have proficiency with all one-handed small arms.

IMPROVED REACTION TIME

Beginning when you choose this archetype at 3rd level,  each time you roll initiative roll 2d6 and add this value to your initiative.

PRECISE SHOT

Starting at 7th level, if you act first before any enemies can act, you have advantage with all attack rolls made with one-handed small arms until the end of your first turn.

QUICK AND THE DEAD

Starting at 11th level, after establishing initiative order, if you have the highest initiative value, said value is a damage bonus to your first hit with a one-handed small arm.

REPUTATION

Starting at 15th level, If you have the highest initiative than anyone (including allies), you gain one additional action on your first turn.

12 O’CLOCK

Starting at 18th level, when you ready an attack action with a one-handed small arm, you have advantage with the attack, and if you hit the target, the attack becomes a critical hit.
